name: Soul Searcher (Accidental Memory)
description:
In a war-torn land lies a great tree that houses the spirits of the fallen.  A warrior fell in battle, but found that the tree has been destroyed! That warrior is you. It is up to you to find out what happened, find other lost spirits, and guide them along your quest. Along the way you find friends, useful items, and recall the events that led up to your demise. Do you have the courage to guide your fellow spirits and restore Memorial Tree?

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Press Z to interact with things. (Works like a Game Boy A Button!)

Press Enter to open the Main Menu.

Press Shift to open the Checklist.

Credit for assets used:

https://www.gbstudio.dev

https://sondanielson.itch.io/gameboy-simple-rpg-tileset
